trello_event_39.desc:
Enabling "Spot Shadow Detail" and "Dynamic Spot Shadows" in Video Settings may assist some players, but is not a full workaround.

Appears to be impacting quad-core machines.

trello_event_105.translated_name: 挑战列出 "造成 50000 伤害"，而不是 5000 伤害

trello_event_106.label: Fix Released
trello_event_106.name: Emote wheel not available during Champion screen.
trello_event_106.translated_name: 在捍卫者画面中无法使用表情轮。

trello_event_107.label: Fix Released
trello_event_107.name: Blank Death Recap when match ends and player isn't the Champion
trello_event_107.translated_name: 当比赛结束且玩家不是捍卫者时的空白死亡回顾

trello_event_108.label: Fix Released
trello_event_108.name: Cannot interact with ziplines during banner retrieval animation.
trello_event_108.translated_name: 无法在收回旗帜动画期间与滑索互动。

trello_event_109.label: Fix Released
trello_event_109.name: While using DX12 and low detail model settings, scanning a ring console will crash the client.
trello_event_109.translated_name: 在使用 DX12 和低细节模型设置时，扫描安全区控制台会使客户端崩溃。

trello_event_110.label: Fix Released
trello_event_110.name: [Switch] Players may not be able to login with Dressed to Kill
trello_event_110.translated_name: [Switch] 玩家可能无法使用 "衣锦还乡 "登录

trello_event_111.label: Fix Released
trello_event_111.name: [Ballistic] Swapping Sling Weapons with Loot Vending Machine doesn't update weapon UI
trello_event_111.translated_name: [弹道] 使用战利品自动售货机交换挂袋武器不会更新武器 UI

trello_event_112.label: Fix Released
trello_event_112.name: [World's Edge] The sun is too bright when looking at players above you.
trello_event_112.translated_name: [世界边缘]看上方的玩家时，太阳太亮了。

trello_event_113.label: Fix Released
trello_event_113.name: [World's Edge] Appears brighter than normal.
trello_event_113.translated_name: [世界边缘] 比正常情况下更亮。

trello_event_114.label: Fix Released
trello_event_114.name: [Wraith] In certain conditions, Wraith can shoot while downed.
trello_event_114.translated_name: [恶灵] 在某些情况下，恶灵可以在被击落时射击。

trello_event_115.label: Fix Released
trello_event_115.name: [Catalyst] Scan Highlights and Diamonds visible through Dark Veil
trello_event_115.translated_name: [卡特莉斯] 通过黑暗面纱看到扫描亮点和钻石

trello_event_116.label: Fix Released
trello_event_116.name: [Firing Range] Joining a player in-progress will not bring recent changes made in lobby.
trello_event_116.translated_name: [射击场] 加入进行中的玩家不会带来大厅中最近的更改。

trello_event_117.label: Fix Released
trello_event_117.name: [Arsenal] Players are currently limited to Firing Range
trello_event_117.translated_name: [武器库赛季] 玩家目前只能使用射击场

trello_event_118.label: Fix Released
trello_event_118.name: [Ballistic] When two Ballistics lock each other with Whistler, weapon and reticles disappear after one has unlocked themselves.
trello_event_118.translated_name: [弹道]当两个 "弹道 "使用 "口哨儿 "锁定对方时，武器和瞄准镜会在其中一个解锁后消失。

trello_event_119.label: Fix Released
trello_event_119.name: [Predator] Rank displays total LP incorrectly in lower ranks
trello_event_119.translated_name: [顶尖猎杀者] 排位赛在较低等级中显示的 LP 总值不正确

trello_event_120.label: Fix Released
trello_event_120.name: [Catalyst] Frame rate drops when prepping Dark Veil.
trello_event_120.translated_name: [卡特莉斯] 准备黑暗面纱时帧速率下降。

trello_event_121.label: Fix Released
trello_event_121.name: Being in Ash's Phase Breach when Ash dies can result in redirects player to a random location
trello_event_121.translated_name: 艾许死亡时，处于艾许的相位突破中的玩家可能会重新定向到一个随机位置

trello_event_122.label: Fix Released
trello_event_122.name: [Switch] Some Switch accounts have not been corrected after a previous persistence issue was resolved.
trello_event_122.translated_name: [Switch]某些 Switch 账户在之前的持久性问题解决后仍未更正。

trello_event_123.label: Fix Released
trello_event_123.name: Audio and VFX drops since S16 launch
trello_event_123.translated_name: 音频和视觉特效自 S16 发布以来有所下降

trello_event_124.label: Fix Released
trello_event_124.name: Gibraltar's Defensive Bombardment warning horn does not play. (All other related audio does)
trello_event_124.translated_name: 直布罗陀的防御轰炸警报喇叭没有响起。(所有其他相关音频都能播放）

trello_event_125.label: Fix Released
trello_event_125.name: Caustic traps disappear when thrown in front of closed doors that are then opened.
trello_event_125.translated_name: 侵蚀陷阱扔到紧闭的门前就会消失，然后再打开。

trello_event_126.label: Fix Released
trello_event_126.name: While using the Bangalore Legend with Viceroy Skin if you ADS with certain scopes (1x Holo & the 2x4x Variable) while using Tactical a texture will block screen.
trello_event_126.translated_name: 在使用带有 "总督皮肤 "的班加罗尔传奇时，如果使用某些瞄准镜（一倍圆和 2x4x 可变瞄准镜）进行 ADS，在使用 "战术 "时，纹理会遮挡屏幕。

trello_event_127.label: Fix Released
trello_event_127.name: Crouch ADS with the prowler does not function after crouching a few times.
trello_event_127.translated_name: 使用猎兽的下蹲 ADS 在下蹲几次后不起作用。

trello_event_128.label: Fix Released
trello_event_128.name: When holding the tactical button to deploy and jump to Echo, Echo will spawn where Vantage spawned, or to the last position Echo was recalled to.
trello_event_128.translated_name: 当按住战术按钮部署并跳转到 Echo 时，Echo 会在万蒂奇生成的地方生成，或者到 Echo 被召回的最后一个位置。

trello_event_129.label: Fix Released
trello_event_129.name: "Splash Zone" ironsight for Flatline is much wider/clearer compared with other Flatline skins
trello_event_129.translated_name: 与其他 VK-47 皮肤相比，VK-47 的 "飞溅区 "瞄准镜更宽/更清晰

trello_event_130.label: Fix Released
trello_event_130.name: Default commands for removing/transferring attachments for weapons was swapped
trello_event_130.translated_name: 移除/转移武器配件的默认命令已交换

trello_event_131.label: Fix Released
trello_event_131.name: [Belgium] players are unable to purchase Sun Squad items.
trello_event_131.translated_name: [比利时]玩家无法购买太阳小队物品。

trello_event_132.label: Fix Released
trello_event_132.name: Performance and stability issues on Xbox platforms
trello_event_132.translated_name: Xbox 平台上的性能和稳定性问题

trello_event_133.label: Fix Released
trello_event_133.name: UI is not accurate for Team Deathmatch
trello_event_133.translated_name: 团队死斗的用户界面不准确

trello_event_134.label: Fix Released
trello_event_134.name: If you see ORIENTATION MATCH on the @PlayApex game mode selector and shouldn't - read here.
trello_event_134.translated_name: 如果您在 @PlayApex 游戏模式选择器上看到了迎新赛，但不应该看到 - 请阅读此处。

trello_event_135.label: Fix Released
trello_event_135.name: [EA App players only] players that buy Apex Coins don't get an updated Coin balance until they restart the game.
trello_event_135.translated_name: [仅限 EA App 玩家]购买 Apex 硬币的玩家在重启游戏前不会获得更新的硬币余额。

trello_event_136.label: Fix Released
trello_event_136.name: [SWITCH ONLY] A small number of Switch players may appear as level 1 or are missing other statistics. We are continuing to investigate the issue and will update ASAP.
trello_event_136.translated_name: [仅限 Switch]少数 Switch 玩家可能显示为 1 级或缺少其他统计数据。我们正在继续调查该问题，并将尽快更新。

trello_event_137.label: Fix Released
trello_event_137.name: UI Images error when playing Olympus
trello_event_137.translated_name: 玩奥林匹斯时出现 UI 图像错误

trello_event_138.label: Fix Released
trello_event_138.name: The third person easter egg can't be activated
trello_event_138.translated_name: 第三人称彩蛋无法激活

trello_event_139.label: Fix Released
trello_event_139.name: Custom Match is missing certain button prompts
trello_event_139.translated_name: 自定义匹配缺少某些按钮提示

trello_event_140.label: Fix Released
trello_event_140.name: Blank ping and emote wheels in the Firing Range
trello_event_140.translated_name: 射击场中的空白标记和表情轮

trello_event_141.label: Fix Released
trello_event_141.name: Wraiths eliminated by headshots create blue and orange particle effects
trello_event_141.translated_name: 爆头消灭的恶灵会产生蓝色和橙色粒子效果
